docs.lead_paragraph: Going to war is a landmark experience in the life of an individual, an episode of tremendous importance, but in the case of Vietnam you learned very quickly to repress it, keep it secret, shut up about it, because people either considered you a sucker or some kind of psychopath who killed women and children.

headline.main: NOW, VIETNAM VETS DEMAND THEIR RIGHTS; Bobby Muller Joe Zengerle VETERANS Dave Christian
